qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Parker City Hospital and Newport General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, E. Cruz or V. Lewis?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: E. Cruz was admitted on April 12, and V. Lewis was admitted on July 23. E. Cruz was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.answer: E. Cruz's pulse rate is 76 beats per minute, and V. Lewis's pulse rate is 92 beats per minute. V. Lewis's pulse rate is higher.
